## :cd: Installation

```sh
git clone git@github.com:%GITHUB_USER%/%NAME%.git
```

```sh
cd %NAME%
```

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>

## :runner: Running

```sh
make run
```

> Access http://localhost
